tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_g_settings_currency AS SELECT amp_currency.currency_code AS id, amp_currency.currency_name AS value FROM amp_currency WHERE (amp_currency.active_flag = 1) AND (NOT amp_currency.virtual_flag) ORDER BY amp_currency.currency_name;
